semantic_identifier: [GOLD-109]: Build attribution + aggregation pipeline for closed-loop learning metrics (by segment/rep/motion)
title: Build attribution + aggregation pipeline for closed-loop learning metrics (by segment/rep/motion)

sections.text: Create a backend job/service that joins persisted outcome events (from GOLD-108) back to recommendation_instance_id and produces daily aggregated performance metrics by segment, rep, and motion (e.g., show→accept, accept→execute, execute→meeting, stage change, win/loss). Store aggregates in a queryable table/API for downstream optimization work, including basic data-quality checks (missing keys, double-counting, late events) and backfill support for recent history. Ensure aggregation is resilient to partial/missing lifecycle events and does not impact core recommendation serving.
